events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product does not match what I ordered and I am quite disappointed.
The customer's message mentions a refund request due to receiving the wrong product, so the issue is categorized as Refund.
The case has been assigned to the refund team to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I am sorry to hear about the issue with your order and Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached some pictures showing the product I received, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will start your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and will wait for the refund in my account.
We have marked your refund as processed, and the case will be closed once you confirm receipt of the amount.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your prompt service and assistance.
We are glad the refund has been received. Closing the case now, and please contact us anytime if you need further support.
